description: time: fix godoc for After and NewTicker.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I removed the whitespace changes.  They were automatically inserted by my nigelize emacs hook.

On 2012/01/06 21:43:38, bradfitz wrote:
> I believe the last spaces-after-periods discussion ended in 1) whatever, 2)
> local consistency, mostly, 3) not making mass edits either way.
> 
> On Fri, Jan 6, 2012 at 1:19 PM, <mailto:gri@golang.org> wrote:
> 
> > LGTM
> >
> > FYI: rsc and r believe in 2 blanks after a period.
> >
> >
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5523049/%3Chttp://codereview.appspot.com/5523049/>
> >

I believe the last spaces-after-periods discussion ended in 1) whatever, 2)
local consistency, mostly, 3) not making mass edits either way.

On Fri, Jan 6, 2012 at 1:19 PM, <gri@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> FYI: rsc and r believe in 2 blanks after a period.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5523049/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5523049/>
>

LGTM

FYI: rsc and r believe in 2 blanks after a period.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9527ad01273b ***
